rules_text:
Flying
When Emillie, Heavenly Baker enters, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
Whenever one or more other nonland permanents you control leave the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Emillie.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Angelic Food Cake: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Angelic Food Cake, for each player, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it. If you own the card, you may cast it this way without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, it costs {2} more to cast.
notes:
Changed front name, slightly adjusted back name, added art, added flavor text
Front: 1/4 —> 3/3
Reworked front 
+Legendary backside
